─────────
What game is it?
─────────
Fun and beautiful side-scrolling platformer, jump and run! One of the most fresh-styled platformer game!

────
Trailer
────
http://www.youtube.com/7thplayground

───
Story
───
Your girl and friends need your help! They are caught by big snakes! Run and jump over the fantastic worlds to save your friends. Fight the bosses for those you love!

────────────
RUN, JUMP and STRIKE
────────────
Simple controls, RUN to the goal, JUMP over the trap, STRIKE to beat enemies!

─────
Features
─────
☺ Side-scrolling platformer adventure
☺ Simple controls
☺ 2 difficulties - easy/normal
☺ OpenFeint achievements with 1000 scores (in Full Version)
☺ Beautiful and colorful graphics
☺ Explore 4 unique worlds, 32 stages (1 world, 8 stages in Lite version)
☺ Boss fight
☺ Seek for friends in each stage
☺ Replay to collect all items
